text: Phir zara us waqt ka tasavvur karo jab tumhare Rubb ne Farishton se kaha tha ke “ main zameen mein ek khalifa banane wala hoon” unhon ne arz kiya : “kya aap zameen mein kisi aisey ko muqarrar karne waley hain, jo iske intezaam ko bigadh dega aur khoon-reziyan karega? Aap ki hamd o sana ke saath tasbeeh aur aap ke liye taqdees to hum kar hi rahey hain.” Farmaya: “ main jaanta hoon jo kuch tum nahin jaante.”
